subject: Time Tracker projects reposted: $2,850 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We have reposted two of the Time Tracker Application projects, now open under Development. 

* Java Custom Time Tracker Application Main Page Phase II Version 3.1 ($700)
* Java Custom Time Tracker Application My Account Config Phase II Version 3.1 ($1,200)
  More details here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

As a reminder, these two projects are essentially small assembly projects, rather than traditional component development projects. Check them out, and good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
